record.title: HONORING THE LIFE OF RUTH BELL GRAHAM

speaking.topic: HONORING THE FIREFIGHTERS IN CHARLESTON, SOUTH CAROLINA
speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent the Senate proceed en bloc to the consideration of three resolutions submitted earlier today, S. Res. 249, S. Res. 250, and S. Res. 251, that the resolutions be considered and agreed to en bloc, the preambles be agreed to en bloc, the motions to reconsider be laid on the table en bloc, the consideration of these items appear separately in the Record, and any statements be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
